version_description:
After several months of hard work we're really excited to finally present Mi Fit 2.0.

We've completely redesigned Mi Fit:

• Status: all personal data is now here. You can understand your body and activity stats at a glance.

• Play: loads of fun stuff all in one place. And even more to come. Stay tuned!

• Profile: manage your smart devices and personal settings in an easy way.

2.0 is a new start for Mi Fit. We're working on even more features. It's worth the wait!

Due to AppStore's feedback problems we won't be able to get back to you here. Go to Profile > Feedback in Mi Fit to submit your suggestions.
We can't imagine ourselves without your support!

1.Increasing sleep editing functions.
2.Fixes bug.

All-new running experience!
 
1. Redesigned running module. 
2. More accurate and full workout data. 
3. Improved watermarks and sharing options.

1. Use Mi Fit for treadmill workouts.
2. Adjust your pace according to the heart rate zone.
3. Fixed bugs.

1. Added 3D Touch functionality for compatible devices. 
2. Now you can leave the screen on while running to monitor your workout stats in real time. 
3. Share results of your workouts in Mi Fit. 
4. Fixed bugs.
1.Fixed bugs.

1. Hold the button on Mi Band 2 to stop the alarm.
2. Turn Snooze mode on and off manually:
- Tap the band to snooze for another 10 minutes.
- The band will notify you only once if Snooze mode is off.
3. Fixed bugs.
1.Fixed bugs.
1.Fixed bugs.

It's been a while! We spent those days working on the app to bring you the best fitness companion possible. Mi Fit 3.0 is packed with new stuff. We hope you'll like it!

If you find any bugs, go to Profile > Settings > Feedback and share your feedback with us.

New Status page: We revamped the start page to give it a cleaner, crisper look. Now you can rearrange items here to see what's important to you first.
 
Sleep data: With the new Sleep page it's much easier to understand your habits now. Stats and advice will help you build on your progress.

Weight data: Weight data is much more informative now. With improved curves and indices, it reflects your progress much better than before.
 
New types of activity: Now you can track fitness data for walking and cycling, and view stats by month and week.
  
Profile: You can manage everything in your profile now. You can also find your achievements, weekly reports, and stats here.

Details: We improved a lot of tiny details. Hope it makes Mi Fit even better!

1. Fixed manual heart rate measurements.
2. Fixed other minor bugs.
